title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 69.4 - Front crossing arm required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 69.4 - Front crossing arm required

State Regulations

Every motor vehicle which is used to vend frozen desserts
to pedestrians on public highways or sidewalks shall be equipped with a front
crossing arm which meets the standards described in section
69.5
of this Part. The front
crossing arm shall be extended whenever the vehicle is stopped on a public
highway to vend frozen desserts. The front crossing arm shall be retracted
whenever the vehicle is in motion or is not being used to vend frozen
desserts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
69.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
